net.blackhacker.crypto

Class PK

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.blackhacker.crypto.Crypto
      • net.blackhacker.crypto.PK
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Decryptor, Encryptor

    public class PK
extends Crypto
    Base class for all implementations of Asymmetric (Public Key) Encryption
    Author:
    Benjamin King aka Blackhacker(bh@blackhacker.net)
    See Also:
    PrivateKey, PublicKey
